favourites.name: Brain Fuck
favourites.description: layered erin first, then sambuca and then avocart(should sit in middle of other two. To drink: use a straw to suck up avocart then shot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.

favourites.name: Queen Bee
favourites.description: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
